title: My wifi works perfectly fine, but can't connect to league. If I use a different wifi it works fine.
body: My internet works perfectly fine. I've tested it at http://www.speedtest.net/, and it works perfectly. I even went onto other games that require internet and it works just fine. Although when I get onto league, it says "logging on" forever, then it says that I have encountered an unknown error and to go to [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944). I tried everything on the website, and nothing worked. I also tried hextech repair tool, and when I tried to start the fix, it said I needed to run it as administrator. I right clicked the program, but I couldn't even run it as administrator, as there was no option for me to do so. Although when I connect to a different wifi connection, everything works perfectly. Thank you in advance if you give any helpful advice.

replies.body:
Do you happen to have this issue if you use an Ethernet cable and connect to your modem or router directly without WiFi? The fact that you can connect on a different network confirms this is something local to your home network. If bypassing your WiFi network doesn't resolve the issue, I encourage you to work through the rest of the steps in our [connection troubleshooting guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if this issue persists through those changes.

23/02/2018 : I just got this problem after doing the 8.4 patch and I'm not the only one even my friends got it. as you said it's something on our wifis even tho we all have different ones. we use the 4G to connect and  swap back to the wifi to play perfectly fine. did you figure out the source of the problem ?

Once in a while my league won't connect even though I am on discord at the same time with friends and the verbal chat does not even cut a little... it seems like Riot's problem, as sometimes it does not send me the connection to the game and therefore I can not play. This is a loading screen issue, while the characters are connecting altogether before entering the rift.

Please explain this to me.
It is fine now, but thank you for taking the time to reply :D
It is fine now, but thank you for taking the time to reply :D
